Body: {"id":"chatcmpl-22","object":"chat.completion","created":1765449798,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"The user asks: \"Где в книге второе упоминание профессора Звёздочкина?\" They want location (e.g., chapter, page, heading) of the second occurrence of the phrase \"профессор Звёздочкина\". We need to find all occurrences, then identify the second. The earlier queries gave one occurrence at HeadingTitle: \"Как Знайка победил профессора Звёздочкин\"? Actually heading title: \"Как Знайка победил профессора Звёздочкина\". That's an occurrence. Need second.\n\nOur attempts to fetch occurrences via QueryCursor gave only one pointer. Possibly there are more occurrences across the book. We need to get all occurrences. Use QueryCursor with instruction to return all semantic pointers. Already attempted but got only one. Maybe need to adjust maxElements/bytes to ensure scanning entire book. The default maxElements 50, maxBytes 4096 might have limited. Use UseWholeBookCursor already but maybe it only returns first portion. Need to paginate through all portions and collect pointers. Use QueryCursor likely processes whole book automatically? It returned only one pointer array. Might need to use MapCursor to collect each portion's occurrences. Let's try MapCursor with instruction to return pointers for each occurrence found and aggregate.
